verbose_text: The KD of Chi3L1, using siChi3L1, decreased cell migration and proliferation, as well as the expression of cancer growth and metastasis genes, such as MMP-9, MMP-13, PCNA, and VEGF, in A549 and H460 human lung cancer cell lines.
evidence: KD of Chi3L1, using siChi3L1, decreased cell migration and proliferation, as well as the expression of cancer growth and metastasis genes, such as MMP-9, MMP-13, PCNA, and VEGF
